body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds two related developments:

1.  Make Seeding aware of RecHit flags while Clustering Ecal. It will allow for example for seeding to avoid recovered channels, allowing to validate and eventually enable #28040 

2. Allow seeding to  select only above-threshold hits. A new DB record has been introduced for this purpose

Standard PR tests
